author: dblevins
msg: [jira is still down for maintenance, not sure what number this is]
Improve the ability to use <Resource> and similar without a service-jar.xml
<Resource> et. al now support 'class-name', 'constructor' and 'factory-name' just like <ServiceProvider> does.
